<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a> = getAccDefMI(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;isFpMLxInstruction(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>-&gt;getOpcode())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r0 = vmla</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r3 = vmla r0, r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// takes 16 - 17 cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r0 = vmla</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r4 = vmul r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r3 = vadd r0, r4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// takes about 14 - 15 cycles even with vmul stalling for 4 cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IgnoreStall.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Swift, we mostly care about hazards from multiplication instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// writing the accumulator and the pipelining of loop iterations by out-of-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order execution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isSwift)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a8962226e1f4ce11a5b7bbb01e20f30c9">isFpMulInstruction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a>-&gt;getOpcode()) || hasLoopHazard(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IgnoreStall.count(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a VMLA.F is followed by an VADD.F or VMUL.F with no RAW hazard, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VADD.F or VMUL.F will stall 4 cycles before issue. The 4 cycle stall</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// preserves the in-order retirement of the instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at the next few instructions, if &#42;most&#42; of them can cause hazards,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the scheduler can&#39;t &#42;fix&#42; this, we&#39;d better break up the VMLA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Limit1 = isLikeA9 ? 1 : 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Limit2 = isLikeA9 ? 1 : 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 1; i &lt;= 4; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = ((int)MIIdx - i + 4) % 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;NextMI = LastMIs&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NextMI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;canCauseFpMLxStall(NextMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i &lt;= Limit1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for VMLx RAW hazard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i &lt;= Limit2 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armhazardrecognizer-cpp/#af4b92b87cdc1663f71632274fefb42c3">hasRAWHazard</a>(getDefReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>), NextMI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
